displayProperties.name: Solar Weapon Surge
displayProperties.description: Your Solar weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Recovery-Forged
displayProperties.description: +3 Recovery

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Solar Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming a Solar weapon.

displayProperties.name: Paracausal Pellets
displayProperties.description: Landing nearly all Stasis pellets will freeze targets; landing nearly all Solar pellets will ignite targets.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Synergy
displayProperties.description: Your [Stasis] Stasis armor pieces increase your overall Power and grant bonus damage with Stasis weapons against combatant [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, and [Void] Void shields.

displayProperties.name: Deprecated Perk
displayProperties.description: Deprecated Perk

displayProperties.name: Font of Endurance
displayProperties.description: You gain a bonus to resilience while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Stat Increase
displayProperties.description: +10 Resilience ▲

displayProperties.name: Widow's Silk
displayProperties.description:
You have an additional grenade charge.

Your grapple creates a Grapple Tangle at the grapple point.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Tempering
displayProperties.description:
Solar weapon final blows grant you and your allies increased recovery for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

While Tempered Metal is active, your weapons have increased airborne effectiveness.

While Ember of Tempering is active, Solar weapon final blows create a Firesprite.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Weapon Surge
displayProperties.description: Your Stasis weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Zen Moment
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with this weapon reduces recoil and flinch over time. Improves base stability.

displayProperties.name: Nanotech Tracer Rockets
displayProperties.description: Landing multiple hits turns your next shot into a homing micro-rocket.

displayProperties.name: Artifice Armor
displayProperties.description: Bonus socket for stat adjustments.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Substantially increases stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
•  increases airborne effectiveness.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Kickstart
displayProperties.description:
When your grenade energy is fully expended, you gain grenade energy.

Additionally, your Armor Charge is consumed and you gain additional grenade energy for each stack.

displayProperties.name: Proximity Ward
displayProperties.description: Gain a powerful overshield while performing your finisher.

displayProperties.name: Vestian Ward
displayProperties.description: Spending a Defiant Key at the end of a Season of Defiance Battleground in which you received Favors of Grace, Justice, and Zeal will award an additional Defiant Engram and War Table reputation.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Strand
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Strand weapons are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Void
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Void weapons are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Solar
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Solar weapons are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Grenades
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your grenades are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Multi-Siphon Mods
displayProperties.description: Grants access to armor mods in your helmet that combine the effects of the Strand Siphon mod with the Solar Siphon and Void Siphon mods.

displayProperties.name: Drengr's Lash
displayProperties.description: Activate your class ability to create a ripple in reality that travels forward along the ground, suspending and damaging targets it hits.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
•  increases airborne effectiveness.

displayProperties.name: Envious Assassin
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets with other weapons before drawing this one transfers ammo to the magazine from reserves. This effect can overflow the magazine based on the number of targets defeated.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Inheritance
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with your Stasis Super refunds Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Shiver Quiver
displayProperties.description: Freezing a target grants this weapon faster draw speed for a short period of time.

displayProperties.name: Arc Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Arc weapons.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Hail Storm
displayProperties.description: Stasis arrows freeze targets on contact and create Stasis crystals when affecting the environment.

displayProperties.name: Third Tail
displayProperties.description: Adds an additional Arc rocket to the second shot in a volley. The Arc rocket jolts targets.

displayProperties.name: Kinetic Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Kinetic weapons over time.

displayProperties.name: Legendary Deeds
displayProperties.description: Spending a Defiant Key at the end of a Season of Defiance Battleground on Legend difficulty increases the amount of gear granted.

displayProperties.name: Reversal of Fortune
displayProperties.description: Missing 2 shots returns a bullet to the magazine after a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Thread of Warding
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Woven Mail.

displayProperties.name: Thread of Rebirth
displayProperties.description:  Strand weapon final blows have a chance to create a Threadling.

displayProperties.name: Stat Increase
displayProperties.description: +5 Intellect ▲

displayProperties.name: Stat Increase
displayProperties.description: +5 All Stats ▲

displayProperties.name: Eager Edge
displayProperties.description: Gain further increased Sword lunge distance immediately after switching to this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Void Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Void weapons over time.

displayProperties.name: Mindspun Invocation
displayProperties.description:
Your grapple, Shackle Grenade, and Threadling Grenade have enhanced functionality.

Your grapple melee spawns three Threadling eggs.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Shackle Grenade and activate Weaver's Trance. Final blows while Weaver's Trance is active create a suspending detonation.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Threadling Grenade and immediately generate five perched Threadlings.

displayProperties.name: Envious Assassin
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with other weapons before drawing this one transfers ammo to the magazine from reserves. This effect can overflow the magazine based on the number of targets defeated.

displayProperties.name: Arc Synergy
displayProperties.description: Your [Arc] Arc armor pieces increase your overall Power and grant bonus damage with [Arc] Arc weapons against combatant [Solar] Solar and [Void] Void shields.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Stasis weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Stasis Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming a Stasis weapon.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo on kill.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Field-Tested
displayProperties.description:
Defeating targets or dealing damage with this weapon gradually increases range, stability, handling, and reload speed.

Swords gain increased charge rate and guard resistance.

displayProperties.name: Keep Away
displayProperties.description: Increased reload, range, and accuracy when no combatants are in close proximity.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Void Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming a Void weapon.

displayProperties.name: Arc Weapon Surge
displayProperties.description: Your Arc weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Firepower
displayProperties.description: Your grenade final blows create Orbs of Power.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Destabilizing Rounds
displayProperties.description: Final blows cause nearby targets to become volatile. Cooldown between activations reduced.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Haste
displayProperties.description: You have greatly increased resilience, recovery, and mobility while sprinting.

displayProperties.name: Big Frigid Glaive
displayProperties.description: Fires a projectile that freezes.

displayProperties.name: Intellect-Forged
displayProperties.description: +3 Intellect

displayProperties.name: Stat Increase
displayProperties.description: +3 Recovery ▲

displayProperties.name: Proximity Ward
displayProperties.description: Gain a powerful overshield while performing your finisher.

displayProperties.name: Lancer's Vigil
displayProperties.description: Improves Diamond Lances

displayProperties.name: Weighted Edge
displayProperties.description: This weapon's melee attacks deal increased damage and slow targets when loaded with ammo.

displayProperties.name: Disorienting Grenades
displayProperties.description: Detonation has a brief disorienting effect.

displayProperties.name: Banshee's Wail
displayProperties.description: Rev to empower; bypasses shields. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Frozen Striker
displayProperties.description: Defeating a target with a Stasis melee spawns a Stasis shard.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Kinetic Reserves
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of ammo you can carry for Kinetic weapons.

displayProperties.name: Strand Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Strand weapons.

displayProperties.name: Nano-entanglement
displayProperties.description: This weapon's damage type becomes Strand. Final blows with grenades from this weapon create Tangles.

displayProperties.name: Stat Increase
displayProperties.description: +5 Resilience ▲

displayProperties.name: Strand Reserves
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of ammo you can carry for Strand weapons.

displayProperties.name: Stat Increase
displayProperties.description: +10 Intellect ▲

displayProperties.name: Solar Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Solar weapons.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: You gain a bonus to mobility while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.
displayProperties.description: You gain a bonus to mobility while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Starvation
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Void Breach or an Orb of Power grants Devour.

displayProperties.name: Replenishing Aegis
displayProperties.description: Blocking damage partially reloads this weapon from reserves. Shortens delay between activations.

displayProperties.name: Valiant Charge
displayProperties.description: Receiving damage while guarding temporarily increases Sword lunge distance.

displayProperties.name: Solar Reserves
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of ammo you can carry for Solar weapons.

displayProperties.name: Utility Finisher
displayProperties.description:
Finishers restore class abilities. 

Consumes 3 or more stacks of Armor Charge, granting additional energy for each charge consumed.

displayProperties.name: Kinetic Tremors
displayProperties.description: Sustained kinetic damage to a target emits a shockwave that damages any nearby targets. Perk activates more quickly.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Handed
displayProperties.description: Your powered melee final blows create Orbs of Power.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Cessation
displayProperties.description:
Finisher final blows create a burst of Void damage that causes nearby combatants to become volatile.

Defeating volatile targets creates a Void Breach.

displayProperties.name: Arc Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Arc weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

displayProperties.name: Rewind Rounds
displayProperties.description: When this weapon's magazine is empty, it more effectively refills from reserves based on the number of hits.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Searing
displayProperties.description: Defeating scorched targets grants melee energy and creates a Firesprite.

displayProperties.name: Conduction Tines
displayProperties.description: Arc ability or jolt final blows restore Arc abilities.

displayProperties.name: Evolution
displayProperties.description:
Transmutation spheres you create can be picked up and wielded as weapons by you or your allies.
• [Light Attack]  : Light attack
• [Heavy Attack]  : Suppressing heavy attack
• [Block]  : Guard/drain nearby targets

displayProperties.name: Headseeker
displayProperties.description: Body shots landed with this weapon increase precision damage and aim assist for a short time. Body shots landed while the perk is active refresh the time.

displayProperties.name: Restorative Finisher
displayProperties.description:
When you use a finisher, you gain a portion of energy for your least-recharged ability. 

Consumes 2 stacks of Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Harvest
displayProperties.description: Defeating weakened targets with precision final blows creates an Orb of Power and a Void Breach.

displayProperties.name: Zen Moment
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with this weapon reduces recoil and flinch over time.

displayProperties.name: Danger Zone
displayProperties.description:
The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants. While active, this weapon deals significantly less damage to the wielder.
Base blast radius is also improved.

displayProperties.name: Healthy Finisher
displayProperties.description:
Finishers heal you.

Consumes 1 stack of Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Bulwark Finisher
displayProperties.description:
Finisher final blows generate an overshield.

Consumes 3 or more stacks of Armor Charge, granting a longer duration to the overshield for each charge consumed.

displayProperties.name: Legion's Bulwark
displayProperties.description: Increases the Arc shield's durability and partially reloads the magazine if it is destroyed.

displayProperties.name: Snapload Finisher
displayProperties.description:
Finishers reload all your weapons. 

Consumes 1 stack of Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Armor of the Colossus
displayProperties.description: While at full health, spinning up this weapon protects you with an Arc shield.

displayProperties.name: Hearts of Ice
displayProperties.description: Winter's Wrath Shockwave deals extra damage and buffs allies.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Combustion
displayProperties.description: Final blows with a Solar Super causes targets to ignite and creates a Firesprite.

displayProperties.name: Danger Zone
displayProperties.description: The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants. While active, this weapon deals significantly less damage to the wielder.

displayProperties.name: Saint's Fists
displayProperties.description: Charge to fire 3 spreads of Kinetic slugs. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Diamond Lance
displayProperties.description:
Shatter or defeat targets with [Stasis] Stasis abilities or weapons to create a Stasis lance.

[Shoot]  : Throw the lance to freeze targets on impact.

[Melee]  : Slam the lance to the ground to freeze targets in a small area.

displayProperties.name: Roaring Flames
displayProperties.description: Final blows with [Solar] Solar abilities or ignitions increase the damage of your Solar abilities. Stacks 3 times.

displayProperties.name: Heat Rises
displayProperties.description:
You can fire weapons, melee, and throw grenades while gliding.

[Grenade]  : Hold to activate Heat Rises, consuming your grenade.

Final blows while airborne increase the duration of Heat Rises and grant melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Special Finisher
displayProperties.description:
Finishers generate Special ammo for the whole fireteam. 

Consumes 3 stacks of Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: See Me, Feel Me
displayProperties.description: After being invisible, your Void weapons gain Volatile Rounds. Finishers while invisible grant bonus damage for all weapons and a reserve overshield for allies.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Melee Kickstart
displayProperties.description:
When your melee energy is fully expended, you gain melee energy.

Additionally, your Armor Charge is consumed and you gain additional melee energy for each stack.

displayProperties.name: Tight Fit
displayProperties.description: Dodging grants reload, handling, and airborne effectiveness for you and nearby allies. Dodge and defeat targets to increase gains.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Utility Kickstart
displayProperties.description:
When your class ability energy is fully expended, you gain class ability energy.

Additionally, your Armor Charge is consumed and you gain additional class ability energy for each stack.

displayProperties.name: One-Two Finisher
displayProperties.description:
Finishers restore melee abilities.

Consumes 3 or more stacks of Armor Charge, granting additional energy for each charge consumed.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Finisher
displayProperties.description:
Finishers restore grenades. 

Consumes 3 or more stacks of Armor Charge, granting additional energy for each charge consumed.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Domineering
displayProperties.description:
After suppressing a target, you gain greatly increased mobility for a short duration, and your equipped weapon is reloaded from reserves.

Defeating suppressed targets creates a Void Breach.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.
